story_99_00040/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey you. You, in the shoddy hat.
You have got some serious nerve, 
waltzing in here wearing an eyesore like that.
story_99_00040/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hang on a minute... You’re Lear, right? 
I don’t appreciate you and your cronies ganging 
up on my friend, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_99_00040/2401_1001_0300_10:
Ugh... Apparently, I was wrong. It’s not
just [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]—the whole group is a dingy eyesore.
story_99_00040/2401_1001_0400_10: You certainly don’t belong on any island I own!
story_99_00040/2401_0401_0600_10:
Did you just—?!
I can’t believe there are still people 
on this island who don’t know who I AM!
story_99_00040/2401_0402_0800_10:
Did you just—?!
I can’t believe there are still people 
on this island who don’t know who I AM!
story_99_00040/2401_1001_0900_10:
I am Lear! It was I who created Pasio, the
magnificent artificial island you now stand on—
and I who founded the Pokémon Masters League!
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1000_10: And it is I who shall be its champion!
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1100_10: You would do well to remember my name.
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1200_10:
Uhhh, not like anybody asked, but I’m Rachel.
See ya around.
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1300_10:
Sawyer.
Anyone who disrespects the young master
will have to answer to me...
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hah! Don’t bother. I doubt these amateurs will
be around long enough to cause us any trouble.
Hahaha! Bwahahaha!
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1500_10:
I can’t believe he just insulted us like that
out of nowhere... Don’t let jerks like him
get to you, all right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1600_10:
You’ve already shown me that you 
and your Pokémon have got some promise 
in this tournament!
story_99_00040/2401_1001_1700_10:
So c’mon! It’s time to take our next step
toward competing in the PML!
